title: New: Her's – Speed Racer
body:
Caught **Her’s** at The Old Blue Last a month or so back for DIY’s Hello 2017 shows, and there’s something disarmingly infectious about their live show.

Off kilter, jangly pop with head nods to Mac Demarco and Foygen – their latest, Speed Racer, is two and a half minutes of funk. Check it out below, and if you’re heading to SXSW be sure to catch a show of theirs.
